I'll Photograph Your Pets!

Posted on Feb 4, 2016

I'll Photograph Your Pets!

If you were to scan through my Flickr portfolio it‚Äôs easy to see that I‚Äôm fond of taking photos of animals. I often visit zoos, animal sanctuaries, the local park or wherever else I can find four-legged critters to shoot. I thought, ‚Äúwouldn‚Äôt it be nice if I had the chance to do this more, and on top of that, be paid to do it?‚Äù

A lovely Spanish Water Dog I met and photographed named Cassie

Well, that‚Äôs my plan. I took on a range of freelance photography jobs last year, ranging from restaurant shoots and portrait sessions to fashion shows and an autumn wedding. However I‚Äôd love to be commissioned to take photos of animals, including cherished pets whose owners want lovely portraits of them to display in their home.

Inspiration

This dream of mine is already being lived by a few of my favourite photographers. Charlotte Reeves and Kaylee Greer are professional dog photographers who spend their days meeting adorable dogs and shooting their portraits, and their work is incredible!

I love the work of Brisbane photographer, Charlotte Reeves

I‚Äôm hoping I‚Äôll be able to tap into the local market of owners who love their dogs, cats, horses or any of their other pets and want keepsakes in the form of gorgeous portraits they can hang on their wall, put in an album or post on Facebook.

Support me on Facebook

I recently set up a Facebook page, likes are appreciated!
